pageTitle: Voler Car IPO Date, Price, GMP, Review, Analysis & Details
pageHeading: Voler Car Limited IPO (Voler Car IPO) Detail

lotSize.summary: Investors can bid for a minimum of 1600 shares and in multiples thereof. The following table depicts the minimum and maximum investment by Retail Investors and HNI in terms of shares and amount.

promoterHolding.promoters: Mr. Vikas Parasrampuria and Mr. Pawan Parasrampuria are the promoters of the company.
promoterHolding.note: The value will be calculated using Equity Dilution = Share Holding Pre Issue - Share Holding Post Issue

about.details:
Incorporated in 2010, Voler Cars Limited provides reliable and efficient employee transportation services (ETS) to large MNCs and corporate clients.

The company offers comprehensive home-to-office transportation with 24/7 customer service, dedicated teams, and over 2,500 vehicles, including cars, SUVs, electric vehicles, buses, and tempo travellers.

In FY 2023-24, the company completed approximately 3,23,550 trips, averaging over 884 visits daily.

The company operates in Kolkata, Mumbai, Pune, Bhubaneshwar, Delhi-NCR, and Ahmedabad, offering corporate transportation with vendor-sourced and leased vehicles, ensuring timely pick-ups and drop-offs per service level agreements (SLA).

The company integrates GPS tracking with third-party technology to manage corporate travel, handling reservations, tracking, incident response, and client SLAs through a unified system.

The company offers Employee Transportation Services (ETS) in Kolkata, Mumbai, Pune, Bhubaneswar, Delhi-NCR, and Ahmedabad, ensuring reliable home-to-office transportation with 24/7 operations for corporate clients.

As of December 31, 2024, the company has 774 Employees.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Long-standing customer relationships
  • An established brand built over the years through operational excellence
  • Asset-light business model
  • Experienced Promoters supported by a management and execution team
  • Scalable business model
  • Quality assurance of their service.

contactDetails.full_address: Voler Car Limited, 22 Burtolla Street, 4th Floor

faqs.question: What is the Voler Car IPO?
faqs.answer:
Voler Car IPO is a SME IPO of 3000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹27.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹90 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on February 12, 2025, and closes on February 14, 2025.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Voler Car IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Voler Car IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Voler Car IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Voler Car IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Voler Car IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Voler Car IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Voler Car IPO opens on February 12, 2025 and closes on February 14, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Voler Car IPO?
faqs.answer: Voler Car IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,44,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Voler Car IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Voler Car IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Voler Car IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Voler Car IPO will be done on Monday, February 17, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, February 18, 2025. Check the Voler Car IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Voler Car IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Voler Car IPO listing date is on Wednesday, February 19, 2025.
